text: The Little Whirlwind is a 1941 animated short movie. It is part of the Mickey Mouse series. It was produced by Walt Disney for Walt Disney Productions. The short was released by RKO Radio Pictures on February 14, 1941. The film was directed by Riley Thomson, and animated by Ward Kimball, Fred Moore, Ken Muse, Jim Armstrong, Les Clark, John Elliotte, Fred Jones, Walt Kelly, and Frank Follmer. Art Fitzpatrick did the animation effects."The Little Whirlwind ". www.bcdb.com It was the 110th short in the Mickey Mouse film series to be released, and the first for that year. ==Voice cast== * Mickey Mouse: Walt Disney * Minnie Mouse: Thelma Boardman ==Home media== The short was released on May 18, 2004 on Walt Disney Treasures: Mickey Mouse in Living Color, Volume Two: 1939-Today. Additional releases include Walt Disney's Classic Cartoon Favorites Starring Mickey Volume 1, and the 2018 Blu-ray/DVD/Digital Celebrating Mickey compilation. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1941 movies Category:Disney animated movies Category:Short movies
title: The Little Whirlwind
